attributes.additional_details:
The Kongo needs democracy just like any other countries in Europe and America.
The Kongo needs someone to respect its opinion, view and choice not being dictated by someone who the nations fear.
Why can't this great country enjoy what God has placed in their land, why does every European and American government have to benefit from these, whilst 5.5million of people including young children under the age of 8 died for nothing and work long hours to find Coltan, Diamonds which they never enrich from or even get a small percentage.

Please make a stop to cruelty and bring Democracy to D.R.Congo
